title: Is Verstappen out of F1 title race? - What to look for at the British GP
summary: As F1 returns to Silverstone, Max Verstappen is slipping out of contention, Lando Norris is chasing a dream home win, and the midfield battle is tighter than ever

qa_pairs.question: Which driver is currently considered to be slipping out of contention for the F1 title?
Which driver is aiming for a home win at the British Grand Prix?
What aspect of the race is described as being tighter than ever?
